name: Specter Detector
description:
Play hide and seek with your friend Neil using your handy Ecto-Scanner app. 

Try to find him before your battery dies!

by Zach Martens @toadboyf and Oli Carioti @frogoblin(s)

Made in 48 hours for Bonfire Jam 

                                          

W-A-S-D to move around
LeftClick to interact 
RightClick to open phone
LeftCtrl to Crouch
Esc to Pause

                                          

Sound Effect: https://www.zedge.net/ringtone/b4a97675-ff78-4725-a763-671d76087d3b by Porcupinette

Pixel front: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7 by Daniel Linssen

Music from: https://louiezong.bandcamp.com/track/old-and-new-dreams

https://louiezong.bandcamp.com/track/urban-sprawl by Louie Zong

Kenney 3d assets https://www.kenney.nl/assets/furniture-kit
